locations.name: James's Bedroom
locations.description: A small bedroom in a shared shotgun-style apartment in the Treme/Marigny neighborhood of New Orleans. Full-size bed with navy blue bedding and two pillows. Wooden nightstand with a digital alarm clock and phone charger cord. Small closet with two white chef's coats and one black chef's coat hanging beside casual clothes. A shelf above the desk holds culinary textbooks (Escoffier's Le Guide Culinaire, Larousse Gastronomique, The Joy of Cooking). A framed poster of jazz musicians performing in a smoky club hangs on the wall. The window looks out onto colorful Treme houses with wrought-iron balconies. A ceiling fan turns slowly overhead. Hardwood floors, slightly worn. A small wooden desk with a recipe notebook, pen, and a stack of culinary school handouts. A bicycle helmet sits on the desk corner.
key_features: full-size bed with navy blue bedding
wooden nightstand with digital alarm clock
small closet with chef's coats hanging
shelf of culinary textbooks (Escoffier, Larousse Gastronomique)
window with view of colorful Treme houses
small wooden desk with recipe notebook

lighting_conditions.morning: warm golden morning light through window, ceiling fan shadow rotating
lighting_conditions.afternoon: bright natural light, warm and humid New Orleans glow
lighting_conditions.evening: warm lamp light on nightstand, soft overhead light
lighting_conditions.late_night: dim nightstand lamp, moonlight through window

variations: wide shot showing bed and desk
closet with chef's coats and bookshelf

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, young man's bedroom in New Orleans shotgun apartment, full-size bed with navy blue bedding, wooden nightstand with alarm clock, small closet with white chef's coats hanging, shelf of culinary textbooks, jazz musician poster on wall, window showing colorful Treme houses with wrought-iron balconies, ceiling fan, worn hardwood floor, small desk with notebook, bicycle helmet, cozy modest room
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, luxury bedroom, large room, modern apartment, dark colors, feminine room, child's room, messy, dirty

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain New Orleans shotgun apartment character with culinary student details

locations.name: Shared Apartment Bathroom
locations.description: A shared bathroom in a New Orleans apartment used by James and his roommate Marcus. Stand-up shower with a blue plastic curtain. Single white porcelain sink with chrome faucet. Mirror cabinet above the sink with small shelf. Men's grooming items on the shelf: electric razor, shaving cream, stick deodorant, a comb. Two towels on wall hooks — one navy blue (James's), one green (Marcus's). White and blue tile floor in a checkerboard pattern. Bright overhead light fixture. A small shelf holds shower supplies — body wash, shampoo. Clean and simple, a young man's functional bathroom.
key_features: blue and white checkerboard tile floor
body wash and shampoo in shower

lighting_conditions.morning: bright overhead bathroom light, no window

variations: facing mirror and sink with grooming items

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, small apartment bathroom, stand-up shower with blue curtain, single white porcelain sink, chrome faucet, mirror cabinet, men's grooming items (razor, shaving cream, deodorant), two towels on hooks (navy blue and green), blue and white checkerboard tile floor, bright overhead light, clean simple young man's bathroom
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, luxury bathroom, bathtub, large bathroom, feminine bathroom, dirty, old, child's bathroom

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain simple shared apartment bathroom atmosphere

locations.name: Culinary School Teaching Kitchen
locations.description: A professional teaching kitchen at the New Orleans Culinary Institute. Long stainless steel counters serve as student workstations, each with a cutting board, knife roll, and mise en place containers. Commercial gas stoves with blue flames line one wall, large hoods above extracting steam. A wall of hanging copper and stainless steel pots and pans gleams under fluorescent lights. A walk-in cooler door (heavy stainless steel with a large handle) is visible at the back. Industrial dishwasher station near the far wall. The instructor's demonstration station is at the front — elevated slightly, with an overhead mirror angled so students can see the cutting board. A whiteboard on the wall lists the day's menu and techniques. Students in white chef's coats and toques work at their stations. The floor is gray non-slip rubber. The air suggests steam, sizzling, and the aroma of Creole spices.
key_features: mise en place containers (small metal bowls)
commercial gas stoves with blue flames
wall of hanging copper and stainless steel pots and pans
walk-in cooler door (stainless steel, large handle)
whiteboard with daily menu and techniques
students in white chef's coats and toques

lighting_conditions.morning: bright fluorescent overhead lights, stove flames glowing blue
lighting_conditions.afternoon: same bright fluorescent lights, steam rising from pots

variations: wide shot showing workstations and stoves
instructor demo station with overhead mirror
knife station and mise en place close-up

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, professional culinary school teaching kitchen, stainless steel counter workstations, cutting boards, knife rolls, mise en place containers, commercial gas stoves with blue flames, large exhaust hoods, hanging copper and stainless pots and pans on wall, walk-in cooler door, instructor's elevated demo station with overhead mirror, whiteboard with menu, students in white chef's coats and toques, gray non-slip floor, bright fluorescent lights, steam and cooking atmosphere

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain professional culinary school kitchen atmosphere with educational elements

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model
generation_settings.notes: Generate 3 reference images per location. Ensure all locations reflect New Orleans architectural character (shotgun apartment) and professional culinary environment.

usage_instructions.step_1: Generate location reference images using prompts above
usage_instructions.step_2: Review and select best images for each location
usage_instructions.step_4: Use selected references with IP-Adapter during scene generation
usage_instructions.step_5: Maintain consistency by using same references for all scenes in that location

notes.rationale: Capture New Orleans shotgun apartment style and professional culinary school environment
notes.cultural_elements: Treme/Marigny neighborhood character, colorful shotgun houses, wrought-iron balconies, French Quarter influence, Creole culinary traditions, jazz culture
notes.character_home_style: Modest shared apartment in historic New Orleans neighborhood, young culinary professionals, functional and well-used spaces
